Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 - WILL it LIVE Up to EXPECTATIONS?
Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 is an upcoming RPG developed by The Chinese Room that seeks to redefine the World of Darkness for the PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. The game centers on Phyre, an Elder vampire who awakens after centuries of slumber in Seattle, where the vampiric landscape has changed significantly. The narrative is described as a neo-noir thriller, emphasizing player choice, and allowing decisions about Phyre’s gender, appearance, and clan to impact gameplay and story outcomes.
